text: Anthocleista scandens is a species of plant in the family Gentianaceae. It is found in Cameroon, Equatorial Guinea, Nigeria, and São Tomé and Príncipe. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== scandens Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Joseph Dalton Hooker Category:Plants described in 1861
title: Anthocleista scandens
